Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo of the Burj Khalifa with the Sri Lankan flag was taken on April 25, 2019, not on Sri Lanka's Independence Day in 2020.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the Burj Khalifa was lit up with the Sri Lankan flag colors to celebrate Sri Lanka's 2020 Independence Day, when in reality it was a display of solidarity following the terrorist attacks in Sri Lanka in 2019.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading Facebook post, while the actual photo and information confirm a different context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the lighting of the Burj Khalifa was specifically done to celebrate Sri Lanka's Independence Day in 2020, without considering the actual reason behind the display of the Sri Lankan flag.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the Burj Khalifa was lit up with the Sri Lankan flag in solidarity with Sri Lanka after the terrorist attacks in 2019, not to celebrate Sri Lanka's Independence Day in 2020.
